trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Ocean City
There were no other sightings in Ocean City on or around June 4th 1996
Summary: starlike object moving freely around changing directions at will
divs: Sighting Detailsme and a friend were at senior week the year of 1996 in ocean city md. we were out late looking for ladies bars closed boardwalk slowed down to noone and we decided eariler in the night to sleep on the beach and get hotel in the morning at check in to save money being it was already late.so about 3:30 am we laid our beach towels down and tried to sleep as we laid down talking about things that transpired eariler i was looking up at the stars and noticed a starlike object moving a first i thought it was a planet then it changed direction i told my friend pointed it out to my friend as we both watched and talked about what it might be maybe a satellite but it changed direction again moving all over the sky 90degree turns curve turns north south east and west nothing like i ever seen before covering great distances across the sky and then back again i know satellites move generally in one direction so i was puzzled this happened over the atlantic ocean for around 1 hour until a group of strangers walked upon us we turned to see what they were doing and when we laid back down we could not locate the object again. my feelings were that what we were seeing was unknown and very spooky i done research and know of nothing that can do what we seen until i watched some ufo documentary shows of orb type objects
